title: Stranraer 0-3 Cowdenbeath: Match Report
text: Stranraer 0-3 Cowdenbeath: Match Report 24 Oct 2015 17:01:00 Three and easy for Cowdenbeath as they defeat fellow strugglers StranraerCowdenbeath got back to winning ways as they convincingly beat Stranraer 3-0 at Stair Park.The visitors, who ended a run of three games without a win, went ahead after 10 minutes when defender Brad Donaldson got past his marker and met Liam Callaghan's corner to head past Stranraer goalkeeper David McGurn.Kyle Miller doubled their advantage just before the hour mark after Callaghan played provider again, this time teeing up Miller before the midfielder slotted his effort into the bottom right corner.Substitute Robbie Buchanan sealed the victory five minutes from time as Cowdenbeath moved a point behind Stranraer, who drop down to eighth in Ladbrokes Scottish League One.
